PAD_RefuseNobleStalk.synopsis: Shadowheart states that she doesn't want to eat the Noblestalk or is not ready for it yet.
PAD_RefuseNobleStalk.how_to_trigger: Attempt to get Shadowheart to eat the noblestalk outside of dialogue (either as avatar or companion)

PAD_NobleStalk.synopsis: Fallback in case the memory stalk dialog does not start. Cheap version of the memory.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Analyzing the two sessions reveals that they are alternatives triggered by the same action. 'PAD_RefuseNobleStalk' occurs when Shadowheart explicitly refuses to eat the noblestalk, indicating that Shadowheart is either unwilling or not ready, whereas 'PAD_NobleStalk' acts as a fallback in case the desired memory stalk dialog does not start. This indicates a mutual exclusivity: if one is triggered, the other should not occur. There is no logical requirement for one session to precede the other, as each represents an alternative outcome of the same in-game action.
